revised_title: Investigations on the Precession of the Equinoxes and Compound Rotatory Motion
tldr: The author, Abram Robertson, examines the precession of the equinoxes and compound rotatory motion, discussing the work of Sir Isaac Newton and other mathematicians. He investigates the principles of compound rotatory motion and calculates the angular velocity produced by the disturbing solar force on the spheroidal figure of the earth, as well as the quantity of annual precession and nutation.
